body_html:
Yes, this is a feature request. My initial understanding was that float16 was already available for most common layers so I wasn't sure whether to treat it as a feature request or a bug.

So yes, I would like to know if there are any current plans for float16 in either slim.separable_conv2d or tf.nn.separable_conv2d.

body:
Yes, this is a feature request. My initial understanding was that float16 was already available for most common layers so I wasn't sure whether to treat it as a feature request or a bug.

So yes, I would like to know if there are any current plans for float16 in either slim.separable_conv2d or tf.nn.separable_conv2d.
